text: Prairie Farms Dairy is a dairy cooperative (group of farms). It was started in Carlinville, Illinois in 1938, and now headquartered in Edwardsville, Illinois, a suburb of St. Louis. As a dairy cooperative, Prairie Farms receives milk from producers and turns it into many different products, including cheese, butter, ice cream, sour cream, cottage cheese, various dips, yogurt, and liquid milk. Category:American food companies Category:1938 establishments in the United States
title: Prairie Farms Dairy
